overview: Josh Delisle, Director of Sales, brings a background in a direct sales, channel sales, sales management, lead generation, and marketing to Dyn Inc. He is responsible for hardening the overall lead generation strategy and sales process, while bridging the gap between direct sales and channel sales, with an eye on overall sales goals. Josh brings over 10 years of technology sales, marketing and business development expertise to Dyn Inc. Josh obtained a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration from the University of New Hampshire.
